CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 3, 1941, pg. 10, reads: "Mr. and Mrs. Abram T. Hall, Sr., pictured last Sunday at the residence of their son and daughter, Mr. and Mrs. Abram T. Hall, Jr., in Cherokee street, when Mr. Hall celebrated his 90th birthday. The other group shows relatives, Mr. and Mrs. E. M. Stewart, of Youngstown, and the Misses Harriet and Janie Walker, of Cleveland, who came over for the celebration.  More than 175 friends called during the afternoon. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of men, women, and boy, including E. M. Stewart, Mrs. Stewart, Charles Stewart, Charles Steward, Harriet Walker, and Janie Walker gathered on steps in front of home of Abram T. Hall Jr., 903 Cherokee Street, Hill District
